message_1: Consider the message "HELLO WORLD" being encrypted using the Rail Fence Cipher with 3 rails. What is the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail Fence Cipher with 3 rails, we write the message in a zigzag pattern along the rails and then read the message along each rail. The pattern looks like this:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

The encrypted message is read along the rails: HORELWLDLO.
